sentence.Network_en: Why, bless you he's in Sheol these five years! "
sentence.Network_cn: 嘿, 不瞒您说,他五年前就进了鬼门关了. ”

sentence.Network_en: Now for it, said I; we'll all land in Sheol in ten minutes, sure.
sentence.Network_cn: 瞧吧, 我说, 不到10分钟咱们全都得到阴曹地府报到, 没错.

sentence.Network_en: Her feet go down to death; Her steps hold fast to Sheol.
sentence.Network_cn: 5她的脚下入死地; 她的脚步迈向阴间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: her house is the way to sheol ., 她的家是在阴间之路.

auth_sentence.content: Them big bugs are the meanest thing this side Sheol.

auth_sentence.content: Besides, as a Christian myself, I can say hell in Greek means sheol or the grave, not a place of torment.
